All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
HomeController
Handles requests related to the home page, sign-up, login, and user sign-in.
LoginController
Controller class for handling login-related requests.
LoginModel
Represents a data model for login information.
LoginService
The Login Service that provides methods for user login
MilestoneApplication
The main class to launch the Spring Boot application.
PostEntity
Represents a post entity, mapping to the "POSTS" table in the database.
PostModel
Represents a PostModel with imageUrl, title, description, date, and userId attributes.
PostRepository
Repository interface for managing PostEntity objects in the database.
PostRowMapper
RowMapper implementation for mapping a ResultSet to a PostEntity object.
PostsBusinessService
A service class for managing posts.
PostServiceInterface
An interface for managing posts.
PostsRestService
Rest controller for managing posts.
RegistrationService
The RegistrationService class provides methods for user registration.
SignUpModel
Represents a data model for sign-up information.
SpringConfig
Configuration class for defining Spring beans.
UserBusinessService
Service class for loading user details during authentication.
UserEntity
Represents a user entity, mapping to the "USERS" table in the database.
UsersDataService
This class provides data access methods for managing users in a database.
UsersRepository
Repository interface for managing UserEntity objects in the database.
WebSecurityConfig
